concept.title: Boards
concept.shortdesc: A board is a place to collaborate around your marketing campaigns. You can pin cards to a board, create boards to manage the cards and other assets, and share cards to other users' boards. You can also invite other Marketing Cloud users to a board, to create a collaborative environment.

conbody.p: For example, you can create a board for marketing reports and analytics. After you run a marketing report, you can share it to a Marketing Cloud board.
conbody.note: A First Time Experience board is available in the Marketing Cloud interface to help you understand feeds, cards, and boards.
